mapper.sql: sid, salarydate, userid, salaryid, date, datetype, attendance, attendance_salary, leavetype, leavesalary, workovertime, worksalary, evection, allowance, timesalary, task, tasksalary, busalary, trafficsalary, additionalsalary, realityattendance, effective_attendance, yo_ask_staff_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from yo_salary
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT sid,salarydate, userid,name, salaryid, DATE, datetype, attendance, attendance_salary, leavetype, leavesalary, workovertime, worksalary, evection, allowance, timesalary, task, tasksalary, busalary, trafficsalary, additionalsalary, realityattendance, effective_attendance, yo_ask_staff_id FROM yo_salary LEFT JOIN staff_info ON userid=staff_user_id
name like CONCAT('%','${name}','%' )
and salarydate like CONCAT('%','${salarydate}','%' )
and datetype like CONCAT('%','${datetype}','%' )
mapper.insert: insert into yo_salary (sid, salarydate, userid, salaryid, date, datetype, attendance, attendance_salary, leavetype, leavesalary, workovertime, worksalary, evection, allowance, timesalary, task, tasksalary, busalary, trafficsalary, additionalsalary, realityattendance, effective_attendance, yo_ask_staff_id) values (#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{salarydate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salaryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{datetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attendance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attendanceSalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{leavetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leavesalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{workovertime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worksalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{evection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allowance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timesalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{task,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tasksalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{busalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{trafficsalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{additionalsalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{realityattendance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effectiveAttendance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yoAskStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update yo_salary
salarydate = #{salarydate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salaryid = #{salaryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date = #{date,jdbcType=DATE},
datetype = #{datetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attendance = #{attendance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attendance_salary = #{attendanceSalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
leavetype = #{leavetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
leavesalary = #{leavesalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
workovertime = #{workovertime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
worksalary = #{worksalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
evection = #{evection,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
allowance = #{allowance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
timesalary = #{timesalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
task = #{task,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tasksalary = #{tasksalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
busalary = #{busalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
trafficsalary = #{trafficsalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
additionalsalary = #{additionalsalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
realityattendance = #{realityattendance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
effective_attendance = #{effectiveAttendance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
yo_ask_staff_id = #{yoAskStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update yo_salary set salarydate = #{salarydate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salaryid = #{salaryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, datetype = #{datetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attendance = #{attendance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attendance_salary = #{attendanceSalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, leavetype = #{leavetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, leavesalary = #{leavesalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, workovertime = #{workovertime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, worksalary = #{worksalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, evection = #{evection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, allowance = #{allowance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, timesalary = #{timesalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, task = #{task,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tasksalary = #{tasksalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, busalary = #{busalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, trafficsalary = #{trafficsalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, additionalsalary = #{additionalsalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, realityattendance = #{realityattendance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, effective_attendance = #{effectiveAttendance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yo_ask_staff_id = #{yoAskStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
